2001.name: ErrInvalidConfigFileCode
2001.long_description: Unable to read mesheryctl config file
2001.probable_cause: Config file is corrupted or not found
2001.suggested_remediation: Run 'mesheryctl system config' to regenerate config file

2002.name: ErrMesheryServerConnectionCode
2002.long_description: Unable to connect to Meshery Server
2002.probable_cause: Meshery Server is not running or not reachable
2002.suggested_remediation: Start Meshery Server using 'mesheryctl system start'

2004.name: ErrDockerNotRunningCode
2004.long_description: Docker is not running or not accessible

2005.name: ErrKubernetesConfigCode
2005.probable_cause: Kubeconfig file not found or invalid
2005.suggested_remediation: Ensure kubectl is configured and kubeconfig is valid

2006.name: ErrSystemStartCode
2006.probable_cause: Docker containers failed to start or insufficient resources
2006.suggested_remediation: Check Docker status and system resources

2008.name: ErrPerformanceTestCode
2008.probable_cause: Invalid test configuration or network issues
2008.suggested_remediation: Check test configuration and network connectivity

2009.name: ErrPatternImportCode
2009.suggested_remediation: Ensure pattern file is valid YAML format

2010.name: ErrMeshDeployCode
2010.probable_cause: Kubernetes cluster not accessible or insufficient permissions
2010.suggested_remediation: Check cluster connectivity and RBAC permissions
